hero.title: Best IPTV Service Provider USA, Canada and Europe – Premium IPTV Worldwide
hero.description: Stream 50,000+ channels in FHD, 4K and 8K. Strong servers, no freeze. Watch live TV, sports, movies, and series on any device. Premium IPTV for USA, Canada and Europe.

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: StreamAtlas brings you premium streaming with no freeze, free guidance, and 50,000+ channels in FHD, 4K and 8K.

items.title: HD & 4K Quality
items.description: Crystal-clear picture quality with full support for Full HD and 4K streaming on compatible devices. Enjoy movies, sports, and live TV in the sharpest detail with minimal buffering and stable streams.

items.title: 24/7 Support
items.description: Our dedicated support team is available around the clock to help you with any questions or technical issues. Get fast responses via WhatsApp so you can enjoy your channels without hassle.

items.title: All Devices
items.description: Watch on Smart TV, Android, iOS, Fire Stick, or any device. One subscription gives you unlimited screens so the whole family can stream at once from TV, phone, tablet, or laptop.

items.title: No Contract
items.description: Flexible plans with no long-term commitment. Cancel anytime with no hidden fees or auto-renewal traps. You stay in control of your subscription.

items.title: Instant Activation
items.description: Your service is activated immediately after payment. No waiting—start watching within minutes. We send your credentials right away so you can stream without delay.

items.title: Satisfy or Refund
items.description: We stand behind our service. If you are not satisfied, we offer a clear refund policy. Your satisfaction is our priority, so you can try us with confidence.

channels.title: Worldwide Channels
channels.subtitle: Watch the best StreamAtlas channel lineup: sports, news, movies and entertainment from around the world.

sports.title: Sport & Events
sports.subtitle: StreamAtlas streams live sports and events in HD—Premier League, La Liga, Serie A, Bundesliga and more.

series.title: Series & On-Demand
series.subtitle: Watch thousands of series and movies on demand. Popular streaming brands and more in one place.

pricing.title: Choose Your Plan
pricing.subtitle: Affordable StreamAtlas plans with 50,000+ channels, no freeze and free guidance. Choose monthly or save with longer plans.

devices.title: Stream on All Devices
devices.subtitle: With StreamAtlas, one subscription lets you watch anywhere—TV, phone, tablet or laptop.

dvr.title: Interactivity & DVR: Control What You Watch
dvr.subtitle: Modern IPTV gives you the power to control your viewing. No more being tied to broadcast schedules.

items.title: Pause, rewind, fast-forward
items.description: Control live TV streams. Pause, rewind, or fast-forward so you never miss a moment—watch on your schedule.

items.title: Catch-up TV
items.description: Never miss your favorite shows. Watch past episodes when it suits you, without being tied to broadcast times.

items.title: Cloud DVR
items.description: Record content and watch it later. Your recordings are stored in the cloud and available on any device.

dvr.closing: This flexibility transforms TV into a fully personalized entertainment hub.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Common questions about StreamAtlas: setup, payment, devices and support.

items.question: What is IPTV?
items.answer: IPTV (Internet Protocol Television) delivers TV content over the internet instead of cable or satellite. You can watch live TV, movies, and series on any device with an internet connection.

items.question: How do I pay?
items.answer: We accept various payment methods including credit card, PayPal, and bank transfer. Contact our support via WhatsApp to complete your order.

items.question: Which devices are supported?
items.answer: Our service works on Smart TVs, Android TV, Fire Stick, Android phones/tablets, iPhones, iPads, Windows, Mac, and many IPTV set-top boxes.

items.question: Is there a free trial?
items.answer: We offer a 24-hour trial for new customers. Contact us via WhatsApp to get free access and test our service before subscribing.

items.question: How do I cancel?
items.answer: No long-term contract required. Your subscription will not auto-renew. Simply do not renew when your plan expires.

items.question: Can I get a refund?
items.answer: Yes. We offer a clear refund policy. If you are not satisfied with the service, contact us via WhatsApp within the refund period and we will process your refund according to our terms. See our Refund Policy page for full details.

items.question: How will I receive my credentials?
items.answer: Right after your payment is confirmed, we send your login details (M3U URL or Xtream Codes: server URL, username, and password) by email and/or WhatsApp—usually within minutes. Check your inbox and spam folder. If you don't receive them, contact us via WhatsApp and we'll resend them.
